title: Xi's article on providing strong sci-tech support for winning war against COVID-19 to be published
content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping inquires about purchasing and supply of people's daily necessities at a community in Wuhan, central China's Hubei Province, March 10, 2020.  (Xinhua/Xie Huanchi)
BEIJING, March 15 (Xinhua) -- An article by President Xi Jinping on providing strong scientific and technological support for winning the battle against novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19) will be published Monday on the Qiushi Journal, a flagship magazine of the Communist Party of China Central Committee.
